Movie.Description: Kanguva is a Tamil movie starring Suriya and Disha Patani in prominent roles. It is directed by Siva.
Bhavani, a teenager, loses her life in an accident. However, she continues to haunt Siddharth, the man who tried to save her life and drives him to uncover the identity of the culprit who killed her.

Lingaa, a petty thief, turns over a new leaf after realising the role his grandfather played in building a dam for the villagers. Then, he dedicates his life towards saving it from a corrupt minister.

Dev is a middle-class guy who falls in love with Ammu. But his love story ends in a bad manner. He then gets married to Nidhi (Tamannaah) and starts a happy life. But a sudden twist changes the life of the couple. What is that twist and how does the couple overcome it forms the rest of the story.
A scientist invents a time-travelling watch, which his evil twin brother wants to get hold of. Years later, the scientist's son battles his uncle, who is still desperately in search of the watch.
SK, an aspiring actor, falls in love with Kavya, a doctor. However, she is engaged to another man and SK tries to sabotage their relationship by making her fall for him.
Joined together by an arranged marriage, an independent young woman and an old fashioned young man start off on the wrong foot and must discover themselves.
Upon finding an abandoned reel, a filmmaker sets off to find its origin and the female lead. However, when he meets the girl and learns the truth about the movie he decides to complete the project.
A criminal mastermind and his team form a plan and commit bank heists across Chennai, but the motive of their heists remains mysterious.
An army captain visits Mumbai to be with his family and find a suitable bride. However, an explosion in the city sets him off on a mission to find and disable a terrorist sleeper cell in the city.
A young man faces a difficult time as he struggles against the privatization of education.
Viduthalai Part 1 is a 2023 Indian Tamil-language period crime thriller film written and directed by Vetrimaaran. Produced by Elred Kumar under the banners of RS Infotainment.
Rudhran is an 2023 Indian Tamil-language action thriller film written by K.P. Thirumaaran, produced and directed by S. Kathiresan under his banner Five Star Creations LLP.
Arivu is a writer for a press and the eldest son of a retired police head constable and his wife. He has a brother named Mathiyazhagan aka Mathi, who is a first-year engineering student.
Sidlingu's passion for cars leads him to Srirangapattana, where he meets Mangala, who helps him realise his dreams. He falls in love with Mangala, who thinks that he is just an innocent youngster.
Ganesh falls for his extremely caring and helpful new neighbour, Nandini, who lives in a house opposite to his. But, when Ganesh and his parents put forth a marriage proposal, she turns them down.
Lalitha and Kumar, two college students, fall in love. However, trouble ensues when their respective families oppose their union.

The movie is directed by Vivek Krishna and featured Naga Chaitanya, Subhalekha Sudhakar, Abhimanyu Singh and Mukul Dev as lead characters. Other popular actors who were roped in for Vikram Dada are Prabhu and Amala Paul.

Pranavam is a gripping murder mystery that revolves around Karthik, a fashion photographer arrested for killing his wife. During the interrogation, Karthik tries to prove his innocence but fails. Will the truth come out?

A scientist working in a millionaire's secret underground lab performs experiments on two giant predatory snakes. However when the creatures escape and go on the rampage, she enlists the aid of a mercenary to put a stop to their campaign of destruction.
Akash, a simple man, falls in love with politician Gajapathi's daughter, Meera. However, on learning the identity of Akash's father, Gajapathi suspects that he wants revenge for a past transgression.
Dayalan, a teacher, tries to change the ongoing malpractices in a government school. Unfortunately, his acts are not welcomed by a few senior members and students, which leads to a rift between them.
A Kathakali dancer becomes visibly disturbed after she is raped but chooses to keep it a secret. However, she gets her revenge and finds peace after she seeks an atypical police officer's guidance.

Thirumurthy and Gurumurthy are brothers, poles apart in nature. Thirumurthy becomes the inspector when their father dies. Gurumurthy, the stronger one helps Thirumurthy in killing Annachi, a gangster.
A paid thug, Attu, and his four friends live in a dump yard and are in constant conflict with Jeya, a drug dealer. Attu becomes Sundari's love interest but their relationship faces too many hurdles.
The screenplay, written by C. Rangavadivelu, is based on an episode from the Virata Parva segment of the Hindu epic Mahabharata, focusing on Keechaka's attempts to woo Draupadi.

Gandharva Maharaj in Paradise - Suman's single-celled daughter Nakshatra - Heba Patel. She, who is the princess of the world, has the desire to live in a world full of love, affection, love, character, anger, hatred... But you cannot live even a day in a world full of manitas.
It stars Vishnu Manchu, who has also produced the film and Taapsee Pannu in the lead roles. While Gopal Reddy S has handled the camera, the music is composed by Mani Sharma.
An innocent software engineer lands in trouble due to his lookalike, a righteous vigilante. When they become aware of each other's existence, they team up against an evil politician.
Charan, a poor boy, confesses to a murder he did not commit and goes to jail for 12 years. Once released, he travels to Bangkok for work and falls in love with Sanjana, the daughter of a rich man.

Sreebala IPS is the officer-in-charge probing the missing case of renowned actress Uma. The smart cop and her colleague Xylex pinpoint a potential criminal in no time, but hardly do they know that the case will also traverse their lives, explaining some surprising turn of events.
The film revolves around a boy who deeply loves a girl. But, by a twist of fate, she harbours some wrong perceptions about him and ends up choosing another man. She is set for a bitter shock.
Two friends who earn money illegally through burglary decide to bid farewell to their life of crime. However, fate has other plans for them.

The camerawork during this chase sequence is exemplary in the way that it shifts between a steadicam when it follows the action and a fixed long shot when it just lets the action overflow from outside the rim of the screen into the centre of the frame.
Miles of Love is a story of how an engaged and career focused girl Neelambhari fell in love with RamaChandraiah a carefree guy in a 9hr journey from Hyderabad to Bangalore.
You Are My Hero is the story of an honest police officer who is brutally murdered along with his wife, seeks revenge even after his death.

This bold social drama evocatively depicts the complexities and complications faced by transgenders in Indian society, through the life of Vinayan, a transgender with male physique and female behavioral traits.
Cinema Kanavugal is a drama film, featuring Bagavathy Bala and Ambani Shankar in prominent roles.

ILANGO and GEETA, a young couple, run away from their homes and get married in the hill town of Kodaikanal and start a new life with nothing else but love and hope. Unexpectedly, Geetha is abducted from their home by an unknown assailant, leaving Ilango for dead.
RJ Madonna, the title character decides to spend a day with the love of her life but ends up spending it with a complete stranger. A stranger who knows deep secrets of her life.
Karna, daring young man, saves Sneha from a terrible fate and sends her to her hometown despite having fallen in love with her due to a secret that he harbours.

Set against the picturesque village of Eganapuram, this rustic tale revolves around Ravi, a traditional folk musician (Parai), who leads a simple and happy life. When a beautiful young woman, Rithika relocates to the village and begins raising ducks in the area, Ravi gets the opportunity to meet with her.
After four daughters with his first wife Vanavan Madevi (Viji Chandrasekhar), Ranasingam sought after a new bride, to beget a son. Afraid of losing her status to a stranger.
Ajit, an investigative television anchor, embarks on a quest to find the mystery behind Hari's murder. Soon, he realizes that Hari's wife gets involved in women trafficking and tries to rescue her.
Tom Stall, a diner owner, becomes a local hero after he foils an attempted robbery. When he tries to return to normalcy, Carl Fogarty, a gangster, alleges that Tom has wronged him.
Paranjothi is an Comedy movie directed by Gobu Balaji. The movie's star cast includes Sarathy, Ansiba Hassan in the main lead roles.
An interfaith, engaged couple find their dreams of a happy marriage evaporating quickly when their devout parents insist on conducting the rituals as per their respective religions.
Iqbal returns from Kuwait in hopes of starting a small business in his hometown. He dreams of a simple life supporting his son's dream of becoming an aeronautical engineer.
The story of "Pallikkoodam" travels through the realities and imagination of a 12 year old boy named Althaf , hailing from a lower middle class family.
It is a love story of two individuals from a same village. Although born and brought up in village, the girl is very modern in her outlook while the guy is simple living.
When a bunch of powerful people decide to take over the lands of the innocent villagers, their leader decides to protect them.
Raghuvaran, an educated yet unemployed engineer, is unwilling to accept jobs that are unrelated to his area of expertise. Soon, his mother's tragic death brings him a job as well as grave challenges.
Kalyan (Murali), a talented magician, works with his friend and assistant Ramesh (Ramesh Khanna). Kalyan's mother (Sathyapriya) insists him to get married soon and she finds a bride for him.
The first story involves the murder of a young politician, Jaimy Padamadan, which is being investigated by Jacob Alexander.
Panduvam is an Indian movie directed by Keetan starring Sidesh and Swasikha.
Panduvam is an Indian movie directed by Keetan starring Sidesh and Swasikha.
The movie is directed by V. Francis Raj and featured Arvee and Alishaa Chopra as lead characters.
A sequel to the film was made and titled as Kalpana 2 which is a remake of Tamil film Kanchana 2. The film was later dubbed into Hindi as Bhagmati by Goldmines Telefilms in 2017.
Kanna Pinna is an Comedy movie directed by Thiya. The movie's star cast includes Thiya, Anjali Rao in the main lead roles.
The movie is directed by Stanley Jose and featured Shrey Josh as lead characters.
A man who performs funeral ceremonies is in love with a woman. One day, after a cremation, he realises that the corpse was that of his beloved.
Set in Bangalore, the story revolves around a bunch of B. Tech students, who perpetually fail their examinations.
Oru Mugathirai wants to be a twisted thriller about a psychologist who has become a psychopath after he has the hots for a student
It takes a special kind of talent to totally make a mess out of a minimalist thriller about a psycho killer with split personality disorder.
The story revolves around four different characters in four different situations. Sairam (Mohanlal) is an assistant manager in a departmental store.
After realising the danger of a bioweapon, a scientist strives to protect it from being misused. When the vial accidentally reaches India, he races against time to prevent a potential disaster.
Rajaram, a millionaire, is cheated by his own domestic servants. When Seetha tries to stop them, they hire hitmen to kill her.

Ramasaamy, who works as a front-end receptionist for Union Minister Viswanathan, decides to pursue civil service. Soon, Viswanathan's daughter falls in love with him after he saves her from gangsters.
Arjun, a talented but failed cricketer, decides to return to cricket in his late thirties, driven by the desire to represent the Indian cricket team and fulfil his son's wish for a jersey as a gift.
A young man aspires to follow in his father's footsteps and become a police officer. However, when his sister is killed, he takes matters into his own hands to catch the culprits.
Arun and Sandhya, a newly married couple, move into a new home to begin their marital life. However, Arun soon realises that his wife is possessed and he must do whatever it takes to save her.
